name: Sprinkle
description: Smarter communication platform for teams that value focus

SPRINKLE_HOST.description: The domain on which you are serving this application.

SPRINKLE_MAILER_HOST.description: The domain via which to send transaction emails (typically the same as SPRINKLE_HOST).

SPRINKLE_SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

SPRINKLE_POOL_SIZE.description: The maximum number of database connections each process may consume.

SPRINKLE_SMTP_HOST.description: The hostname of the your SMTP provider.

SPRINKLE_SMTP_PORT.description: The port number for your SMTP provider.

SPRINKLE_SMTP_USERNAME.description: The username for your SMTP provider.

SPRINKLE_SMTP_PASSWORD.description: The password for your SMTP provider.
